channel.title: Nvidia on PolloChang 工作筆記
channel.description: Recent content in Nvidia on PolloChang 工作筆記

item.title: Update Nvidia 470 Dirver
item.description: 環境 OS: Debian 11 GPU: Nvidia 410 執行步驟 安裝 linux-headers 及必要套件 sudo apt -y install linux-headers-$(uname -r) build-essential libglvnd-dev pkg-config 移除不必要套件 下載最新 Nvidia driver 到以下網址下載最新的驅動程式 https://www.nvidia.com/zh-tw/geforce/drivers/ wget https://tw.download.nvidia.com/XFree86/Linux-x86_64/470.256.02/NVIDIA-Linux-x86_64-470.256.02.run 更新 sudo bash ./NVIDIA-Linux-x86_64-470.256.02.run
